name: Cannon Recochet
description:
Cannon Recochet

Cannon Recochet is a small action game where you need to survive as long as possible.

It was made for the WeeklyGamejam #194 with two friends of mine and had the theme "Tiny Boat".
It was our first time making a game.

If you want to have the best possible experience I would recommend you to download an executable for you operating system and play it there instead of the browser version.

It was a lot of fun creating this game in just 6 days as we wanted the seventh day just for play testing and getting feedback if something goes wrong. I'm glad we did it in time :)

So yeah, as I summarized at the top this game's goal is to survive as long as possible to get a high score. A small tutorial is implemented in the game so you are able to learn how it works and what you do in the game is most of the time dodging or reflecting cannon balls to your enemy ships ^^

Art by TheMeatman (Robin)
Music by Chrisgamma (Christian K)
Programmed by (me) Lauriichan (Laura E)

All assets (Art, Music and Code) as well as the Godot project can be downloaded or just viewed on Github
